name: The Justice and Diversity Center (JDC) of the Bar Association of San Francisco (BASF) - Legal Advice and Referral Clinic (LARC) by
description: The Legal Advice and Referral Clinic (LARC) is a way for people to find out whether they have a legal issue, get brief advice on issues, learn about the next steps, and get referrals to further help. As its priority, the clinic is intended to address the legal needs of low-income individuals however all are welcomed. Businesses, nonprofit organizations, tenants' associations, or similar groups are not eligible. There are now 3 locations. Please see below.
